column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The warm bread and butter to start off the dinner was quite good as was the list of craft cocktails and craft beer. For a Â starter
column2: I shared the lettuce with the thick slices of bacon (excellent). My friend ordered the ribeye
column3: which he said was as good as Chicago Cut. I ordered the chicken (not fried)
column4: which was moist on the inside and had nice
column5: crispy skin on the outside--excellent dish. For a side
column6: we chose the elote style corn which was out of this world.
